scripts.dev: npm run replica && npm run deploy && npm run decl && cd frontend && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run const && dfx deploy main --no-wallet && npm run decl
scripts.const:prod: dfx canister --network ic create --all --no-wallet && node constants.js prod
scripts.decl: npm run decl:frontend && npm run decl:cli
scripts.lint: npm run lint:cli && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run const:prod && dfx build --network ic && npm run const
scripts.deploy:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run const:prod && dfx deploy --network ic --no-wallet && npm run const
